issue.title: [CF 448] Spell queued activation border request
issue.body:
Hello, thank you for creating a great add-on and I was hoping to make good use of it. Unfortunately I play with a degree of latency.  With the standard UI buttons once a spell has been queued a yellow border is displayed, at this point I can move on to clicking the next spell. With a 200 - 250ms delay this is really handy.

Would it be possible to add this feature?

For example:

Prot Warrior. When Revenge procs I would like the Revenge icon to appear, but to behave in appearance like a normal bar button would. Once I have spammed my revenge hotkey and the spell is queued, the yellow spell queued border appears. At this point I can spam my next key.

Regards.


> Posted by CurseForge user Slainny | Imported from CurseForge issue #448 | Raw

comments.body:
I'm not ruling it out, but I won't make any guarantees either. The implementation of this would be awkward at best, and I'm not entirely sure it would even be possible - I will have to take a look at Blizzard's code.

Edited Feb 28, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
